resources.string: "The device contacts need to be read."
"The device storage needs to be read."
Use the input below to select a file for processing. When it is uploaded you will be assigned a processing id for the computation.
When a user has been assigned processing id(s) for the computation, the task(s) can be reviewed by pressing the button below.
This application is to aid in offload computing functionality. The app was designed for Richard Yu at Carleton University in 2016 by Joseph Mitchell.
